meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size
meanings.sent1: The teenty kitten fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The teenty flower bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent3: I found a teenty pebble in my shoe!
meanings.sent4: Her teenty voice was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The teenty stars twinkled in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: She added a teenty of sugar to her tea.
meanings.sent2: There was only a teenty of milk left in the bottle.
meanings.sent3: He asked for a teenty more time to finish his homework.
meanings.sent4: The teenty of laughter in the room made everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: I could hear a teenty of excitement in her voice.
